title: MultiChoiceView
subtitle: Multiple checkable items
description: A custom layout View which holds multiple named checkable items. The sungle- of multiple choice may be implemented. This View requires its content to be instantiated from code by setting a collection of item names. The actual item Views are built byan abstract builder asynchronously during measure-layout process. The the obtained item  Views are laid out in optimal way inside the container.

title: ReadMoreTextView
subtitle: TextView with "read more" support
description: A custom TextView descend which shows requested "Read Moere" text as the ellipsize mark in case of an original text does not fit into the View dimensions. The ReadMoreTextView must have maxLines property geater 0. The "Read More" mark may be HTML and be clickable

title: DiscreteSeekBar
subtitle: A SeekBar with discrete values
description: This is a custom SeekBar which uses predefined set of integer values to select from. These values must be sorted out ascending. The currently selected value is displayed on the touchable picker

title: VerticalSeekBar
